verses.roman:
caitanya-candrera kṛpā hañāche iṅhāre
caitanya-candrera 'bātula' ke rākhite pāre?"

synonyms: caitanya-candrera—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kṛpā—mercy; hañāche iṅhāre—has been bestowed upon him; caitanya-candrera—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bātula—madman; ke—who; rākhite pāre—can keep.
translation: "Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu has fully bestowed His mercy on him. Who can keep home such a madman of Caitanyacandra?"
